Here is the list of signs at $LINE, along with their scores and descriptions:
1. Aries - 8/10 - A natural-born leader, Aries are often bold and confident, but can also be impulsive and reckless.
2. Taurus - 6/10 - Practical and dependable, Taurus are steady and hardworking, but can also be stubborn and resistant to change.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis are curious and communicative, but can also be scatterbrained and easily distracted.
4. Cancer - 5/10 - Emotional and empathetic, Cancers are nurturing and protective, but can also be moody and clingy.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos are natural performers who crave attention and admiration, but can also be prideful and domineering.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos are hardworking and practical, but can also be perfectionistic and critical.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, Libras are balance-loving and fair-minded, but can also be indecisive and people-pleasing.
8. Scorpio - 10/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpios are perceptive and private, but can also be obsessive and controlling.
9. Sagittarius - 8/10 - Adventurous and optimistic, Sagittarians are freedom-loving and enthusiastic, but can also be reckless and tactless.
10. Capricorn - 6/10 - Disciplined and responsible, Capricorns are ambitious and patient, but can also be strict and aloof.
11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians are inventive and unconventional, but can also be detached and rebellious.
12. Pisces - 4/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are dreamy and artistic, but can also be spaced-out and indecisive.

Please note that these scores are subjective and based on general astrological interpretations. The actual performance of a sign at $LINE may vary depending on individual circumstances and chart factors.
